name: open-edison-connector-dxt
description: Build scripts for Open Edison Connector Desktop Extension

scripts.build: echo 'Building Open Edison Connector Desktop Extension...' && npm run validate && npm run pack
scripts.validate: echo 'Validating manifest.json...' && dxt validate manifest.json || echo 'DXT CLI not found, skipping validation'
scripts.pack: dxt pack || echo 'DXT CLI not found. Install with: npm install -g @anthropic-ai/dxt'
scripts.install-deps: echo 'No Python dependencies needed - using mcp-remote'

author: Open Edison Team
